item.title: The doors of Wanda Realm Fuyang are now open
item.description:
Wanda Hotels & Resorts has expanded its portfolio with the opening of Wanda Realm Fuyang in the bustling business district of Fuyang, Anhui province, China. This addition marks the company’s 78th hotel, the 42nd under its ownership and management, and the 30th property under the Wanda Realm brand. Andr√© Liu, General Manager of Wanda Realm Fuyang, highlighted the strategic importance of the location, stating, “Fuyang city is a rapidly developing hub with the largest population and fourth-largest size in Anhui province...
